identifier.description: An unambiguous ID given to the model or data. This can also be created automatically by a software tool

creator.description: The person(s) that created this FSK file including all metadata

software.description: The program or software language in which the model has been implemented

author.description: Person(s) who generated the model code or generated the data set originally

format.description: File extension of the model or data file (including version number of format if applicable)

description.description: General description of the study, data or model

language.description: A language of the resource (some data or reports can be available in French language for example)

source.description: A source from which the model/data is derived

availability.description: Availability of data or model, i.e. if the annotated model code / data is included in this FSK file

creationDate.description: Creation date/time of the FSK file

url.description: Web address referencing the resource location (data for example)

objective.description: Objective of the model or data

date.description: Temporal information on the publication date

website.description: A link to the publication website (different from DOI)

issue.description: Data on the details of the journal in which the model or the data has been described

publicationType.description: The type of publication, e.g. Report, Journal article, Book, Online database, ...

abstract.description: Abstract of the publication in which the model or the data has been described

isReferenceDescription.description: Indicates whether this specific publication serves as the reference description for the model. There has to be at least one reference where this field is set to 'True'

pmid.description: The PubMed ID related to this publication

title.description: Title of the publication in which the model or the data has been described

volume.description: Data on the details of the journal in which the model or the data has been described

journal.description: Data on the details of the journal in which the model or the data has been described

authorList.description: Name and surname of the authors who contributed to this publication

comment.description: Further comments related to the reference description, e.g. which section in there describes the specific model or which figure in there can be reproduced with the visualization script

doi.description: The DOI related to this publication

status.description: The status of this publication, e.g. Published, Submitted, etc.

modificationDate.description: Date/time of the last version of the FSK file

rights.description: Rights granted for usage, distribution and modification of this FSK file

name.description: A name given to the model or data

languageWrittenIn.description: Software language used to write the model, e.g. R or MatLab

value.description: Defines the impact of the process on the hazard (so far only valid for process models and predictive models)

modelClass.description: Type of model according to RAKIP classification

value.description: Sub-cassification of the model given the Model Class

status.description: The curation status of the model
